item.title: Publications Samples
item.description: This is a sample post intended to test the followings: A different post author. Table of contents. Markdown content rendering. Math rendering. Emoji rendering. Markdown Syntax Rendering Headings The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest. 2022 Don’t communicate by sharing memory, share memory by communicating.Rob Pike1 The above quote is excerpted from Rob Pike’s talk during Gopherfest, November 18, 2015.
